name: Jigsaw Puzzles Real
description:
Jigsaw Puzzles that is a really free jigsaw game! The puzzle that gives you the perfect free Jigsaw puzzle experience:


Everything in the game is free!
• All 2400 photos are free!
• Create custom jigsaw puzzles from your album photos? Also free.
• Pick any number of pieces and rotation in our jigsaw puzzle game - free also.
No need to pay to unlock photos or premium version.


And more:
• Jigsaw Puzzles sizes: From 9 (novice jigsaw) to 1300 pieces (expert puzzle).
• Your Own Photos: Play jig saw puzzles with any family photo you have on your phone or tablet!
• More Photos: Over 2400 free photos in 35 themes.
• Unique Puzzle: Each piece forms an unique jigsaw puzzle design.


There's a vast amount of free photo puzzles packs, such as: beach puzzles, mountain, castle, pet jigsaws, cats and dogs puzzles, Halloween jigsaws, etc.


Permission to Read storage/Album: this permission is optional, it will be asked if you try to create a puzzle from your album photos.


Please send your suggestions and problem reports to our puzzles: jigsaw.and@rottzgames.com


Over 300 MILLION free puzzles played! Thanks for loving Jigsaw Puzzles!


Enjoy!
